TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EnvelopeVersion extends System.Object

summary.span: Contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.

span.span: Contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前可用的 SOAP 版本為 SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2。The SOAP versions currently available are SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2. 每個版本的 SOAP 都有一個 ，可以使用 和 屬性來復原。There is an for each of these versions of SOAP that can be recovered using the and properties. 此外，還有 訊息版本，可以用來傳送與接收不使用 SOAP 格式的 XML 訊息。There is also a message version that is used to sent and receive XML messages that do not use SOAP formatting. 與每個訊息版本相關的處理角色，可以使用 屬性和 方法來復原。The processing roles associated with each message version can be recovered using the property and the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何存取 的方法和屬性。The following code shows how to access the methods and properties of . [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string[] GetUltimateDestinationActorValues() cil managed

summary.span: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the ultimate destination.

span.span: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the ultimate destination.

returns.span: An empty string if SOAP1.1 is used; a string that contains http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/ultimateReceiver if SOAP1.2 is used.

span.span: An empty string if SOAP1.1 is used; a string that contains http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/ultimateReceiver if SOAP1.2 is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定 `null`，則最終接收者為 。The ultimate receiver is `null` if is specified. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NextDestinationActorValue As String
public: property System::String ^ NextDestinationActorValue { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the next destination.

span.span: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the next destination.

value.span: 字串，包含http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/actor/next如果使用 SOAP1.1; 字串，其中包含http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/next如果使用 SOAP1.2，則; 以及如果訊息版本 none，則為空字串。

span.span: A string that contains http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/actor/next if SOAP1.1 is used; a string that contains http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/next if SOAP1.2 is used; and an empty string if the message version is none.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property None As EnvelopeVersion
public: static property System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ None { System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the envelope version not using a version of SOAP.

span.span: Gets the envelope version not using a version of SOAP.

value.span: 不使用 SOAP 格式的封套版本。

span.span: The envelope version not using a SOAP formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用 訊息版本，則表示 SOAP 封套並未寫出，而且訊息會發出本文內容。If the message version is used this means that a SOAP envelope is not written out and the message emits the contents of the body. 這可讓 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 通道，與所預期 XML 的格式沒有 SOAP 端點進行通訊。This enables an Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) channel to communicate with an endpoint that is expecting XML with no SOAP formatting. XML 承載存在於訊息本文中，當它遇到編碼器時，也是唯一發送出的東西。The XML payload lives in the body of a message and is the only thing emitted when it hits the encoder. 同樣地，當收到任意 XML 區塊時，它會包裝在訊息中，以傳播通道堆疊。Similarly, when the arbitrary chunk of XML is received it is wrapped up in a Message for propagation up the channel stack. 接著，會插入所需的標頭，並處理該訊息，就如同它是 SOAP 訊息一樣。The required headers are inserted and the message is processed as if it had been a SOAP message. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#3)]

public: static property System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ Soap11 { System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱的結構描述[SOAP 1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96641)。For more information, see the schema for [SOAP 1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96641). ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#1)]
